words.title: http
words.meaning: Hypertext Transfer Protocol, is something cool

words.title: html
words.meaning: Hypertext Markup Language, which helps you to create web pages

words.title: Algolia
words.meaning: This is a hosted search engine, offering capable of delivering real-time results from the first keystroke and have search API.

words.title: React InstantSearch
words.meaning: This is an open-source, production-ready UI library for React that lets you quickly build a search interface in your front-end application and it is a React library that lets you create an instant search results experience using Algolia's search API.

words.title: Widgets in React InstantSearch
words.meaning: They are React components that have a predefined behavior and render output (DOM or Native).1-predefined widgets, 2-extending widgets, 3-custom widgets

words.title: attributes in React InstantSearch
words.meaning: Widgets usually have options to alter their behavior a bit; options can be passed to widgets via attributes.

words.title: InstantSearch root widget
words.meaning: This widget is the InstantSearch root widget, which is responsible for the communication between your application and Algolia. This widget wraps all other React InstantSearch widgets.
